ethics.title: Ethical & methodological principles
ethics.transparencyDesc: Open source code (MIT), documented methodology, explainable justifications
ethics.privacyDesc: No permanent storage, no user profiling, ephemeral processing
ethics.educationDesc: Educational tool to understand persuasive mechanisms, not an absolute verdict
ethics.nuanceDesc: Cultural context, humor and satire can create false positives
ethics.collaborationDesc: Open community, contributions welcome (researchers, fact-checkers, educators)

mission.text: Our mission: Make visible the mechanisms of persuasion, propaganda, emotional manipulation and disinformation through quantified scores, explicit mathematical formulas and consultable evidence. A critical analysis tool for informed and auditable decisions, serving media literacy and critical thinking.
